ar_EG {
    Version{"2.0"}
    calendar {
        gregorian {
           weekend:intvector {
             6, 0,   // onset dow, millis in day  (Friday     12:00am)
             1, 0    // cease dow, millis in day  (Saturday   12:00am)
           }
        }
    }
}
